author: admin
title: Best headphones
text:
Stay on top of your sound with What Hi-Fi? in your inbox every week Thank you for registering for our Newsletter We will send you relevant emails and updates. We round-up the best of the best – from in-ear to on-ear, wireless to noise-cancelling – to bring you the ultimate headphones buying guide. 
If you want to know the best headphones to buy for a wide range of budgets, you've come to the right place. Whether you're after the best wireless, Bluetooth or noise-cancelling cans, and whether you prefer in-ear or over-ear, we've got it covered. 
We've even tested sports headphones and offer some suitable options for the iPhone.
